example_sentence_english: The taste of the salad is good.
The smell comes from the salad.
I found a cucumber in the salad.
Put the cheese on the salad.
I remove water from the salads.
I find more pepper in the salads.
Put the dressing on the salads.

example_sentence_italian: Serviamo il formaggio con le insalate.
example_sentence_english: We serve the cheese with the salads.
